name: Placeholder Content
author: Travis Freeman

sections.description: There are occasions when you need to manually create multiple Posts to see how they look with your chosen WP Theme. This plugin assists in auto generating placeholder content instead of you doing so manually. Simply follow the easy steps below to create that dummy content for your website. Please note that you should not use this for actual content of a live website.

short_description: Generate Posts with \"Lorem Ipsum\" text for the purpose of testing content layout.
